action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to enhance user experience.
notes: Focus on User Appearance tab to set landing page and improve patient search functionality.

action_item: Security - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process to update the password from the settings tab.

action_item: Security - Update eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Ensure to validate current ID before creating a new eSignature ID.

action_item: Security - Update visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize CCDA templates for clinical summaries.
notes: Select and order sections of patient charts to include in summaries.
